==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|金|曜}}

===Etymology===
/kin'eu/ → /kin'yoː/. Originally it meant the planet Venus<ref name="Amoghavajra" />. A [[calque]] of {{cog|la|dies Veneris}} and its descendants, reinterpreting the day as having been named after the planet [[Venus]] (instead of the Roman goddess). Compare {{m|ja|金星|tr=kinsei|gloss=Venus (planet)}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/kiɴjoː/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きんよう|hhira=きんえう}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic}} planet [[Venus]]
# [[Friday]]

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|金曜日}} (kin'yōbi)

===See also===
* {{l|ja|七曜}} (shichiyō)
